subject: Re: Boxes [1 Attachment]
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text: My humble little opinion about the charity thing:  People will pay $500 for something they know YOU tinkered with, as they have faith it's the best money can buy, no matter the parts it was constructed from.  And if you can make a little money, you deserve it, every penny, no matter how much, because we wouldn't be here without you.
